text: Oh
it's fashion week in New York and over
the last week we've looked at hundreds
of collections from designers who are
showing us what we should be wearing for
spring 2013 I can sum it up in two words
Prison Break we've seen stripes black
and white blue and white red and white
red and blue green and blue on almost
every collection this season it's been
incredibly graphic and a complete
surprise when you're seeing the same

Jacobs michael kors Tommy Hilfiger
Joseph Alcazar as a young guard the old
guard everybody's doing it I feel like
there's it's a real black and white
graphic kind of 1960s edie sedgwick
bondage kind of a moment the black and
white and the graphic suddenly feel so
new and fresh even though in a way it is
very retro and very vintage inspired was
after all the pre interval a season
after they decorate the Creator suit

lower on the hips some visible hip bones
a little bit of midriff bear there which
is unusual for Marc Jacobs who loves
girls covered up
I was really surprised to see Jason Wu
talking about Helmut Newton this season
that's obviously the photographer who
made SNM part of his visual language and
when mr. Wu showed his collection we saw
a lot of leather harnesses worked into
his sheer lacy dresses we bought Jason
Wu he was one of our favorite shows this
week it was just truly phenomenal and
there's a lot of lace and it was really

can't see without being vulgar yeah I
think fashion is much faster now but i
think you know there's certain things
that are still very old-fashioned like
how a jacket is made and how address is
needed so I think it's really important
for my generation to sort of make great

collection of our first idea was the
idea of collage and the idea of
randomness we really want to explore the
idea of leather to in leather is the
material that we're really attracted to
but it's always kind of felt like a fall
fabric dress in a way so we asked
ourselves how can we do this and make it
feel light
I love the Proenza show I thought that
was really beautiful the grommet looks
so cool on everything I mean I can't
believe they managed to make those look
so fresh all that perforated leather
there was so much texture so it's been a
good week
if you've been following fashion for a
while you'll know it's been quite some
time since designers agreed about
anything to see a single trim coming out
of the spring collection so strongly
it's very unusual and I think one of the
big reasons for that is obviously
designers are still reacting to a tough

should be back in the stores buying new
